What an incredibly uninteresting ritual. Yeah, yeah, insects are cool. Bah.
LanguageData.VME_AwkwardInsectoidHymn.stages.0.label: awkward insectoid hymn
LanguageData.VME_AwkwardInsectoidHymn.stages.0.descri: The speech was repetitive, and it did nothing to convince me of the divinity of our beloved insects.
LanguageData.VME_RousingInsectoidHymn.stages.0.label: rousing insectoid hymn
LanguageData.VME_RousingInsectoidHymn.stages.0.descri: The chanter showed impressing skill and the hymn appropriately extolled the virtues of our way of life.
LanguageData.VME_EntrancingInsectoidHymn.stages.0.des: I can still hear the mesmerizing words of the hymn, like a myriad insectile legs crawling all over our bodies.
